meanings.definition: Bluejeans: a type of pants made of denim fabric, typically blue in color.
meanings.sent1: She wore her favorite bluejeans to the party.
meanings.sent2: Bluejeans are a popular choice for casual wear.
meanings.sent3: The bluejeans danced in the wind on the clothesline.
meanings.sent4: His love for bluejeans was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The bluejeans hugged her legs like a second skin.

meanings.definition: Bluejeans: to wear bluejeans as clothing.
meanings.sent1: He decided to bluejeans for the hiking trip.
meanings.sent3: I bluejeans my way through the week.
meanings.sent4: They bluejeans their confidence with every step.
meanings.sent5: The team bluejeans together for unity.
